price: haasaa fakkaataa isaatiin haa dhufanu Yoo kan dhugaa dubbatan ta’an.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
